item.title: posts[0]
item.description: Recently I have found the motto below very motivating, which was quoted by one of our team members when trying to resolve a comment on his pull request. So let’s kick off this post section and try to build stuff continously and incrementally.
item.content:
Recently I have found the motto below very motivating, which was quoted by one of our team members when trying to resolve a comment on his pull request.

So let’s kick off this post section and try to build stuff continously and incrementally.
